text: The Universal Church of Gods Power is a neo-evangelical church founded in Sorocaba, Brazil on March 3, 1998 by Apostle Valdemiro Santiago. The denomination has 6,000 temples in 24 countries.https://religionnews.com/2013/04/01/brazilian-evangelist-has-big- plans-for-u-s/ The headquarter of the World Church of the Power of God is located in a temple named "World City", in the Brás neighborhood, in São Paulo, alternating the main meetings with the World City of Dreams of God in the Santo Amaro neighborhood, with scattered temples. As a distinguishing feature of other denominations, the church focuses primarily on healing, and miracles, with various testimonies being presented during the church service and World Network programming. ==References== == External Links == * Official Site * Most richest denominations * * Megachurch to be founded in Houston Category:Evangelical denominations established in the 20th century Category:Evangelical churches in Brazil Category:1998 establishments in Brazil
